scripts.test: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && mocha
scripts.deploy-polygon: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_test.js --network polygon
scripts.deployment-tests-1: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_tests_1.js --network polygon
scripts.deployment-tests-2: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_tests_2.js --network polygon
